meanings.definition: The act of inserting something again.
meanings.sent1: After the surgery, the doctor performed reinsertions of the tubes.
meanings.sent2: The reinsertions of the missing pages into the book were done carefully.
meanings.sent3: The reinsertions of the puzzle pieces were so precise that it looked like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her reinsertions of the fallen leaves into the tree symbolized renewal and growth.
meanings.sent5: The reinsertions of the keys into the lock were like a dance of precision.

meanings.definition: The process of putting something back in its original position.
meanings.sent1: The reinsertions of the misplaced furniture made the room look tidy again.
meanings.sent2: His reinsertions of the scattered toys into the box were quick and efficient.
meanings.sent3: The reinsertions of the fallen dominoes created a chain reaction of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The reinsertions of the fallen stars into the night sky painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: Her reinsertions of the fallen petals into the flower bed were gentle and caring.
